title: Dont listen to the "I got banned wtf" threads...
body:
90% of cheaters are pathological liars in denial of their skill and their actions.

99% of cheaters will visit the forum in denial of the consequences handed to them and then continue to cry and cry and cry some more about how "innocent" they are.

Don't even listen to their nonsense. They are guilty and should not be given any attention.

Riot thank you for cleaning out the lowest of the low. Cheating scum!

Have a {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
You spout shit about cheats when most of them are about toxicity anyway.

And no not 90% and 99% the stat is closer to 45% and 65%, some people do get banned for crap out of their control, riot has even said that people can get banned for hacking etc if someone else manages to get their password, then uses that password and accesses the account from a different IP address enough.

Or the people who get caught by those scams or have key loggers they don't know about (because some people aren't even tech savvy enough to know what an anti-virus is, let alone detect them (and remove them) without an anti-virus) can get banned for fraud, riot doesn't really help them either, they just skirt around the issue because its easier and more convenient for the company and so even the innocent people get pinned as guilty. 

Your argument is invalid.
